Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6345 affecting package python-setuptools for versions less than 69.0.3-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6345 affecting package python-setuptools for versions less than 69.0.3-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-setuptools is earlier than 69.0.3-4, affected by CVE-2024-6345
